**Who we are?**

We are different than your average hosting company. We will not rely on a bunch of flashy marketing to get your attention. Simply Digital Hosting is about providing quality, reliable, excellent hosting services. We also don’t lie to you with saying you get unlimited hard disk, bandwidth or other things.  We keep it simple, clean, and clear on what you get and how it helps you with out the BS’s. We are also the 1st Virtualmin web host to be using PHP-FPM for efficient PHP websites. We were the developers of the mod recently contributed to Virtualmin to enable this ability
